short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the text 'elon musk' with 'mr burns'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of your online experience being dominated by the name Elon Musk? Does this make you feel overwhelmed and stressed? Welcome, you've come to the right place. Here with a click of a button you can replace THAT name with this: Monty Burns otherwise known as Mr Burns. Eh-xcellent

Download and share this extension to spread the escapism. You're welcome.



[ thanks to the millennial to snake people + cloud to butt community ]
